start.text: {name}, you are in a dark forest. There is a path to the left and a path to the right. You also see a sign pointing forward.

go_left.text: {name}, you find a hidden treasure chest! Do you open it or leave it?

go_right.text: You encounter a wild animal! Do you fight it or run away?

go_forward.text: You come across a mysterious old man. He offers you a choice of three potions: red, blue, and green.

open_chest.text: The chest is filled with gold! You are rich! But you hear footsteps approaching...

leave_chest.text: You walk away, leaving the treasure behind. You find a hidden path leading to a village.

fight_animal.text: You bravely fight the animal and win! You find a cave nearby.

run_away.text: You run away safely and find a river. Do you follow it upstream or downstream?

red_potion.text: You drink the red potion and feel a surge of strength. You continue your journey with newfound energy.

blue_potion.text: You drink the blue potion and feel a sense of calm and clarity. You see a hidden path illuminated.

green_potion.text: You drink the green potion and feel dizzy. You fall asleep and wake up in a different place.

hide_with_gold.text: You hide behind the chest as a group of bandits arrive. They leave without noticing you.

flee_with_gold.text: You grab as much gold as you can and run. You find a marketplace where you can trade the gold.

enter_village.text: You enter the village and find it bustling with activity. You see an inn and a marketplace.

avoid_village.text: You avoid the village and continue your journey. You find a serene lake.
